fields.name: settings
fields.description: Site wide settings and defaults.

fields.name: comment
fields.description: Finds a specific comment based on it's id.

fields.name: assets
fields.description: All assets. Requires the `ADMIN` role.

fields.name: asset
fields.description: Find or create an asset by url, or just find with the ID.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments returned based on a query.

fields.name: commentCount
fields.description:
Return the count of comments satisfied by the query. Note that this edge is
expensive as it is not batched. Requires the `ADMIN` role.

fields.name: userCount
fields.description:
Return the count of users satisfied by the query. Note that this edge is
expensive as it is not batched. This field is restricted.

fields.name: me
fields.description:
The currently logged in user based on the request. Requires any logged in
role.

fields.name: users
fields.description: Users returned based on a query. Requires the `ADMIN` role.

fields.name: user
fields.description: a single User by id

types.name: Settings
types.description: Settings stores the global settings for a given installation.

fields.name: moderation
fields.description: moderation is the moderation mode for all Asset's on the site.

fields.name: requireEmailConfirmation
fields.description: Enables a requirement for email confirmation before a user can login.

fields.name: infoBoxEnable
fields.description:
infoBoxEnable will enable the Info Box content visible above the question
box.

fields.name: infoBoxContent
fields.description: infoBoxContent is the content of the Info Box.

fields.name: questionBoxEnable
fields.description:
questionBoxEnable will enable the Question Box's content to be visible above
The comment box.

fields.name: questionBoxContent
fields.description: questionBoxContent is the content of the Question Box.

fields.name: premodLinksEnable
fields.description: premodLinksEnable will put all comments that contain links into premod.

fields.name: questionBoxIcon
fields.description: questionBoxIcon is the icon for the Question Box.

fields.name: autoCloseStream
fields.description:
autoCloseStream when true will auto close the stream when the `closeTimeout`
amount of seconds have been reached.

fields.name: customCssUrl
fields.description: customCssUrl is the URL of the custom CSS used to display on the frontend.

fields.name: closedTimeout
fields.description:
closedTimeout is the amount of seconds from the created_at timestamp that a
given asset will be considered closed.

fields.name: closedMessage
fields.description:
closedMessage is the message shown to the user when the given Asset is
closed.

fields.name: disableCommenting
fields.description: disableCommenting will disable commenting site-wide.

fields.name: disableCommentingMessage
fields.description:
disableCommentingMessage will be shown above the comment stream while
commenting is disabled site-wide.

fields.name: editCommentWindowLength
fields.description:
editCommentWindowLength is the length of time (in milliseconds) after a
comment is posted that it can still be edited by the author.

fields.name: charCountEnable
fields.description: charCountEnable is true when the character count restriction is enabled.

fields.name: charCount
fields.description: charCount is the maximum number of characters a comment may be.

fields.name: organizationName
fields.description: organizationName is the name of the organization.

fields.name: organizationContactEmail
fields.description: organizationContactEmail is the email of the organization.

fields.name: wordlist
fields.description: wordlist will return a given list of words.

fields.name: domains
fields.description: domains will return a given list of domains.

fields.name: karmaThresholds
fields.description:
karmaThresholds contains the currently set thresholds for triggering Trust
beheviour.

types.name: MODERATION_MODE
types.description: The moderation mode of the site.

enumValues.name: PRE
enumValues.description:
Comments posted while in `PRE` mode will be labeled with a `PREMOD`
status and will require a moderator decision before being visible.

enumValues.name: POST
enumValues.description: Comments posted while in `POST` will be visible immediately.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: Wordlist
types.description: Wordlist describes all the available wordlists.

fields.name: banned
fields.description: banned words will by default reject the comment if it is found.

fields.name: suspect
fields.description: suspect words will simply flag the comment.

types.name: Domains
types.description: Domains describes all the available lists of domains.

fields.name: whitelist
fields.description: whitelist is the list of domains that the embed is allowed to render on.

types.name: KarmaThresholds
types.description:
KarmaThresholds contains the currently set thresholds for triggering Trust
beheviour.

fields.name: flag
fields.description:
flag represents karma settings in relation to how well a User's flagging
abilityÂ aligns with the moderation decicions made by moderators.

fields.name: comment
fields.description:
comment represents the karma setting in relation to how well a User's
comments are moderated.

types.name: KarmaThreshold
types.description:
KarmaThreshold defines the bounds for which a User will become unreliable or
reliable based on their karma score. If the score is equal or less than the
unreliable value, they are unreliable. If the score is equal or more than the
reliable value, they are reliable. If they are neither reliable or unreliable
then they are neutral.

types.name: ID
types.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: Comment
types.description: Comment is the base representation of user interaction in Talk.

fields.name: parent
fields.description: The parent of the comment (if there is one).

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID of the comment.

fields.name: body
fields.description: The actual comment data.

fields.name: body_history
fields.description:
The body history of the comment. Requires the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role or
the author.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: The tags on the comment

fields.name: user
fields.description: The user who authored the comment.

fields.name: replies
fields.description: The replies that were made to the comment.

args.name: query
args.defaultValue: {sortOrder: ASC, sortBy: CREATED_AT, limit: 3, excludeDeleted: false}

fields.name: replyCount
fields.description:
replyCount is the number of replies with a depth of 1. Only direct replies
to this comment are counted. Deleted comments are included in this count.

fields.name: actions
fields.description: Actions completed on the parent. Requires the `ADMIN` role.

fields.name: action_summaries
fields.description: Action summaries against a comment.

fields.name: asset
fields.description: The asset that a comment was made on.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of a comment.

fields.name: status_history
fields.description: The status history of the comment. Requires the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: deleted_at
fields.description: The date that the comment was deleted at if it was.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: The time when the comment was created

fields.name: updated_at
fields.description: The time when the comment was updated.

fields.name: editing
fields.description: describes how the comment can be edited

fields.name: hasParent
fields.description: Indicates if it has a parent

fields.name: url
fields.description: url is the permalink to this particular Comment on the Asset.

types.name: Date
types.description: Date represented as an ISO8601 string

types.name: TagLink
types.description: TagLink is used to associate a given Tag with a Model via a TagLink.

fields.name: tag
fields.description:
The underlying Tag that is either duplicated from the global list or created
uniquely for this specific model.

fields.name: assigned_by
fields.description:
The user that assigned the tag. This TagLink could have been created by the
system, in which case this will be null. It could also be null if the
current user is not an Admin/Moderator.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: The date that the TagLink was created.

types.name: Tag
types.description:
Tag represents the underlying Tag that can be either stored in a global list
or added uniquely to the entity.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The actual name of the tag entry.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: The time that this Tag was created.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID of the User.

fields.name: username
fields.description: Username of a user.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: creation date of user

fields.name: action_summaries
fields.description: Action summaries against the user.

fields.name: actions
fields.description: Actions completed on the parent.

fields.name: role
fields.description: The current roles of the user.

fields.name: profiles
fields.description: The current profiles of the user.

fields.name: email
fields.description:
The primary email address of the user. Only accessible to Administrators or
the current user.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: The tags on the user.

fields.name: ignoredUsers
fields.description: ignored users.

fields.name: tokens
fields.description: Tokens are the personal access tokens for a given user.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: returns all comments based on a query.

fields.name: reliable
fields.description:
reliable is the reference to a given user's Reliability. If the requesting
user does not have permission to access the reliability, null will be
returned.

fields.name: state
fields.description: returns user status

fields.name: lastAccountDownload
fields.description:
lastAccountDownload is the date that the user last requested a comment
download.

fields.name: scheduledDeletionDate
fields.description:
scheduledDeletionDate is the data for which the user account will be deleted
after. The account may be deleted up to half an hour after this date because
the job responsible for deleting the scheduled account will only run once
every half hour.

types.name: ActionSummary
types.description: A summary of actions based on the specific grouping of the group_id.

fields.name: count
fields.description: The count of actions with this group.

fields.name: current_user
fields.description: The current user's action.

types.name: Action
types.description: An action rendered against a parent entity item.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID of the action.

fields.name: user
fields.description: The author of the action.

fields.name: updated_at
fields.description: The time when the Action was updated.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: The time when the Action was created.

types.name: USER_ROLES
types.description: Roles that a user can have, these can be combined.

enumValues.name: ADMIN
enumValues.description: an administrator of the site

enumValues.name: MODERATOR
enumValues.description: a moderator of the site

enumValues.name: STAFF
enumValues.description: a staff of the site

enumValues.name: COMMENTER
enumValues.description: a user without administrative roles.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The id is an identifier for the user profile (email, facebook id, etc)

fields.name: provider
fields.description: name of the provider attached to the authentication mode

types.name: Token
types.description: Token is a personal access token associated with a given user.

fields.name: id
fields.description: ID is the unique identifier for the token.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name is the description for the token.

fields.name: active
fields.description: Active determines if the token is available to hit the API.

fields.name: jwt
fields.description:
JWT is the actual token to use for authentication, this is only available
on token creation, otherwise it will be null.

types.name: CommentsQuery
types.description: CommentsQuery allows the ability to query comments by a specific methods.

inputFields.name: author_id
inputFields.description: Author of the comments.

inputFields.name: statuses
inputFields.description:
Current status of a comment.
This field is restricted.

inputFields.name: asset_id
inputFields.description: Asset that a comment is on.

inputFields.name: parent_id
inputFields.description: The parent of the comment that we want to retrieve.

inputFields.name: action_type
inputFields.description:
Comments returned will only be ones which have at least one action of this
type. Requires the `ADMIN` role.

inputFields.name: limit
inputFields.description: Limit the number of results to be returned.

inputFields.name: cursor
inputFields.description: Skip results from the last created_at timestamp.

inputFields.name: sortOrder
inputFields.description: Sort the results by from largest first.

inputFields.name: sortBy
inputFields.description:
The order to sort the comments by, sorting by default the created at
timestamp.

inputFields.name: tags
inputFields.description: Filter by a specific tag name.

inputFields.name: excludeIgnored
inputFields.description: Exclude comments ignored by the requesting user

inputFields.name: excludeDeleted
inputFields.description: excludeDeleted when true will exclude deleted comments from the response.

types.name: COMMENT_STATUS
types.description: The statuses that a comment may have.

enumValues.name: NONE
enumValues.description:
The comment is not PREMOD, but was not applied a moderation status by a
moderator.

enumValues.name: ACCEPTED
enumValues.description: The comment has been accepted by a moderator.

enumValues.name: REJECTED
enumValues.description: The comment has been rejected by a moderator.

enumValues.name: PREMOD
enumValues.description:
The comment was created while the asset's premoderation option was on, and
new comments that haven't been moderated yet are referred to as
"premoderated" or "premod" comments.

enumValues.name: SYSTEM_WITHHELD
enumValues.description:
SYSTEM_WITHHELD represents a comment that was withheld by the system because
it was flagged by an internal process for further review.

enumValues.name: FLAG
enumValues.description: Represents a FlagAction.

enumValues.name: DONTAGREE
enumValues.description: Represents a don't agree action

enumValues.name: RESPECT
enumValues.description: Represents a Respect.

types.name: Cursor
types.description: Cursor represents a paginating cursor.

types.name: SORT_ORDER
types.description: Establishes the ordering of the content by their created_at time stamp.

enumValues.name: DESC
enumValues.description: newest to oldest order.

enumValues.name: ASC
enumValues.description: oldest to newer order.

enumValues.name: CREATED_AT
enumValues.description: Comments will be sorted by their created at date.

enumValues.name: REPLIES
enumValues.description:
Comments will be sorted by their immediate reply count (replies to the comment
in question only, not including descendants).

enumValues.name: RESPECTS
enumValues.description:
Comments will be sorted by their count of respects
on the comment.

types.name: CommentConnection
types.description: CommentConnection represents a paginable subset of a comment list.

fields.name: hasNextPage
fields.description: Indicates that there are more comments after this subset.

fields.name: startCursor
fields.description: Cursor of first comment in subset.

fields.name: endCursor
fields.description: Cursor of last comment in subset.

fields.name: nodes
fields.description: Subset of comments.

types.name: Reliability
types.description:
Reliability defines how a given user should be considered reliable for their
comment or flag activity.

fields.name: flagger
fields.description:
flagger will be `true` when the flagger is reliable, `false` if not, or
`null` if the reliability cannot be determined.

fields.name: flaggerKarma
fields.description:
flaggerKarma will contains the number of agreed flags vs disagred flag
count.

fields.name: commenter
fields.description:
Commenter will be `true` when the commenter is reliable, `false` if not, or
`null` if the reliability cannot be determined.

fields.name: commenterKarma
fields.description:
commenterKarma the number of approved comments (not untouched) subtracted by
the number of rejected comments.

types.name: UserState
types.description: UserState describes the different permission based details for a user.

fields.name: status
fields.description: status describes the statuses of different aspects of the user's details.

fields.name: username
fields.description: username is the status of the username.

fields.name: banned
fields.description: banned is the bool that determines if the user is banned or not.

fields.name: suspension
fields.description: suspension is the date that the user is suspended until.

types.name: USER_STATUS_USERNAME
types.description: USER_STATUS_USERNAME is the different states that a username can be in.

enumValues.name: UNSET
enumValues.description:
UNSET is used when the username can be changed, and does not necessarily
require moderator action to become active. This can be used when the user
signs up with a social login and has the option of setting their own
username.

enumValues.name: SET
enumValues.description:
SET is used when the username has been set for the first time, but cannot
change without the username being rejected by a moderator and that moderator
agreeing that the username should be allowed to change.

enumValues.name: APPROVED
enumValues.description:
APPROVED is used when the username was changed, and subsequently approved by
said moderator.

enumValues.name: REJECTED
enumValues.description:
REJECTED is used when the username was changed, and subsequently rejected by
said moderator.

enumValues.name: CHANGED
enumValues.description:
CHANGED is used after a user has changed their username after it was
rejected.

inputFields.name: sortOrder
inputFields.description: Sort the results by from smallest first.

inputFields.name: sortBy
inputFields.description:
The order to sort the comments by, sorting by default the created at
timestamp.

inputFields.name: limit
inputFields.description: Limit the number of results to be returned.

inputFields.name: excludeIgnored
inputFields.description: Exclude comments ignored by the requesting user

inputFields.name: excludeDeleted
inputFields.description: excludeDeleted when true will exclude deleted comments from the response.

types.name: Asset
types.description: Where comments are made on.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The current ID of the asset.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The scraped title of the asset.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL that the asset is located on.

fields.name: comments
fields.description:
The comments that are attached to the asset. When `deep` is true, the
comments returned will be at all depths.

args.name: query
args.defaultValue: {statuses: [NONE, ACCEPTED], limit: 10, sortOrder: DESC, sortBy: CREATED_AT, excludeDeleted: false}

fields.name: comment
fields.description: A Comment from the Asset by comment's ID

fields.name: commentCount
fields.description: The count of top level comments on the asset.

fields.name: totalCommentCount
fields.description: The total count of all comments made on the asset.

fields.name: settings
fields.description:
The settings (rectified with the global settings) that should be applied to
this asset.

fields.name: closedAt
fields.description: The date that the asset was closed at.

fields.name: isClosed
fields.description: True if asset is closed.

fields.name: action_summaries
fields.description:
Summary of all Actions against all entities associated with the Asset.
(likes, flags, etc.). Requires the `ADMIN` role.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: The date that the asset was created.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: The tags on the asset

fields.name: author
fields.description: The author(s) of the asset.

types.name: AssetActionSummary
types.description: A summary of actions for a specific action type on an Asset.

fields.name: actionCount
fields.description: Number of actions associated with actionable types on this this Asset.

fields.name: actionableItemCount
fields.description: Number of unique actionable types that are referenced by the actions.

types.name: AssetsQuery
types.description: AssetsQuery allows teh ability to query assets by specific fields

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: a search string to match against titles, authors, urls, etc.

inputFields.name: limit
inputFields.description: Limit the number of results to be returned

inputFields.name: open
inputFields.description:
open filters assets that are open/closed/all. Not providing this parameter
will return all the assets, true will return assets that are open, and false
will return assets that are closed.

inputFields.name: sortOrder
inputFields.description: sortOrder specifies the order of the sort for the returned Assets.

inputFields.name: cursor
inputFields.description: Skip results from the last created_at timestamp.

types.name: AssetConnection
types.description: AssetConnection represents a paginable subset of a asset list.

fields.name: hasNextPage
fields.description: Indicates that there are more assets after this subset.

fields.name: startCursor
fields.description: Cursor of first asset in subset.

fields.name: endCursor
fields.description: Cursor of last asset in subset.

fields.name: nodes
fields.description: Subset of assets.

types.name: CommentCountQuery
types.description:
CommentCountQuery allows the ability to query comment counts by specific
methods.

inputFields.name: statuses
inputFields.description:
Current status of a comment.
This field is restricted.

inputFields.name: asset_id
inputFields.description: Asset that a comment is on.

inputFields.name: asset_url
inputFields.description: The URL that the asset is located on.

inputFields.name: parent_id
inputFields.description: The parent of the comment that we want to retrieve.

inputFields.name: action_type
inputFields.description:
comments returned will only be ones which have at least one action of this
type.

inputFields.name: author_id
inputFields.description:
author_id allows the querying of comment counts based on the author of the
comments.

inputFields.name: tags
inputFields.description: Filter by a specific tag name.

inputFields.name: excludeDeleted
inputFields.description: excludeDeleted when true will exclude deleted comments from the count.

types.name: UserCountQuery
types.description:
UserCountQuery allows the ability to query user counts by specific
methods.

inputFields.name: action_type
inputFields.description:
comments returned will only be ones which have at least one action of this
type.

inputFields.name: state
inputFields.description: state queries for a specific subset of users with the given state query.

types.name: UserStatusInput
types.description: UserStatusInput describes the queryable components of the UserStatus.

inputFields.name: username
inputFields.description:
username will restrict the returned users to only those with the given
username status's. If not provided, no filtering will be performed.

inputFields.name: banned
inputFields.description:
banned will restrict the returned users to only those that are, or are not
banned. If not provided, no filtering will be performed.

inputFields.name: suspended
inputFields.description:
suspended will restrict the returned users to only those that are, or are not
suspended. If not provided, no filtering will be performed.

types.name: UsersQuery
types.description: UsersQuery allows the ability to query users by a specific fields.

inputFields.name: action_type
inputFields.description: Users returned will only be ones which have at least one action of this.

inputFields.name: state
inputFields.description: state will filter the users to a specific set of users that meet.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: value is the search string to use to search for a pa

inputFields.name: limit
inputFields.description: Limit the number of results to be returned.

inputFields.name: cursor
inputFields.description: Skip results from the last created_at timestamp.

inputFields.name: sortOrder
inputFields.description: Sort the results by created_at.

types.name: UserConnection
types.description: UserConnection represents a paginable subset of a user list.

fields.name: hasNextPage
fields.description: Indicates that there are more users after this subset.

fields.name: startCursor
fields.description: Cursor of first user in subset.

fields.name: endCursor
fields.description: Cursor of last user in subset.

fields.name: nodes
fields.description: Subset of users.

fields.name: createComment
fields.description: Creates a comment on the asset.

fields.name: createFlag
fields.description: Creates a flag on an entity.

fields.name: createDontAgree
fields.description: Creates a don't agree action on an entity.

fields.name: deleteAction
fields.description: Delete an action based on the action id.

fields.name: editComment
fields.description: Edit a comment

fields.name: suspendUser
fields.description:
Sets the suspension status on a given user. Requires the `MODERATOR` role.
Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: unsuspendUser
fields.description:
Sets the suspension status on a given user. Requires the `MODERATOR` role.
Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: banUser
fields.description:
Sets the ban status on a given user. Requires the `MODERATOR` role.
Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: unbanUser
fields.description:
Sets the ban status on a given user. Requires the `MODERATOR` role.
Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: approveUsername
fields.description:
Sets the username status on a given user to `APPROVED`. Requires the
`MODERATOR` role. Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: rejectUsername
fields.description:
Sets the username status on a given user to `REJECTED`. Requires the
`MODERATOR` role. Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: changeUsername
fields.description:
Changes the username to the desired username. Mutation is restricted to
those users with permission do to so.

fields.name: setUsername
fields.description:
Sets the username to the desired username if the user has not had a chance
to set their username. Mutation is restricted to those users with permission
do to so that have not done so before.

fields.name: setCommentStatus
fields.description:
Sets Comment status. Requires the `ADMIN` role.
Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: addTag
fields.description: Add a tag.

fields.name: removeTag
fields.description: Removes a tag.

fields.name: setUserRole
fields.description:
Set's a given users role to the one provided. If `null` is passed, the user
will not have any role.

fields.name: updateAssetSettings
fields.description:
Updates settings on a given asset.
Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: updateAssetStatus
fields.description:
Updates the status of an asset allowing you to close/reopen an asset for
commenting.
Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: closeAsset
fields.description: closeAsset will close the asset for commenting based on server time.

fields.name: updateSettings
fields.description:
updateSettings will update the global settings.
Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: ignoreUser
fields.description: Ignore comments by another user

fields.name: createToken
fields.description:
CreateToken will create a token that is attached to the current user.
Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: revokeToken
fields.description:
RevokeToken will revoke an existing token.
Mutation is restricted.

fields.name: stopIgnoringUser
fields.description: Stop Ignoring comments by another user.

fields.name: forceScrapeAsset
fields.description: forceScrapeAsset will force scrape the Asset with the given ID.

fields.name: delUser
fields.description: delUser will delete the user with the specified id.

fields.name: changePassword
fields.description:
changePassword allows the current user to change their password that have an
associated local user account.

fields.name: updateEmailAddress
fields.description: updateEmailAddress changes the email address of the current logged in user.

fields.name: attachLocalAuth
fields.description:
attachLocalAuth will attach a new local authentication profile to an
account.

fields.name: requestDownloadLink
fields.description:
requestDownloadLink will request a download link be sent to the primary
users email address.

fields.name: requestAccountDeletion
fields.description:
requestAccountDeletion requests that the current account get deleted. The
mutation will return the date that the account is scheduled to be deleted.

fields.name: cancelAccountDeletion
fields.description:
cancelAccountDeletion will cancel a pending account deletion that was
previously scheduled.

fields.name: downloadUser
fields.description:
downloadUser will provide an account download for the indicated User. This
mutation requires the ADMIN role.

fields.name: createRespectAction
fields.description: Creates a respect on an entity.

types.name: CreateCommentInput
types.description: CreateCommentInput is the input content used to create a new comment.

inputFields.name: asset_id
inputFields.description: The asset id

inputFields.name: parent_id
inputFields.description: The id of the parent comment

inputFields.name: body
inputFields.description: The body of the comment

inputFields.name: tags
inputFields.description: Tags

types.name: CreateCommentResponse
types.description:
CreateCommentResponse is returned with the comment that was created and any
errors that may have occurred in the attempt to create it.

fields.name: comment
fields.description: The comment that was created.

fields.name: actions
fields.description: Actions that was assigned during creation of the comment.

fields.name: errors

types.name: AssetSettingsInput
types.description:
Configurable settings that can be overridden for the Asset. You must specify
all fields that should be updated.

inputFields.name: premodLinksEnable
inputFields.description: premodLinksEnable will put all comments that contain links into premod.

inputFields.name: moderation
inputFields.description: moderation is the moderation mode for the asset.

inputFields.name: questionBoxEnable
inputFields.description:
questionBoxEnable will enable the Question Boxs' content to be visible above
The comment box.

inputFields.name: questionBoxContent
inputFields.description: questionBoxContent is the content of the Question Box.

inputFields.name: questionBoxIcon
inputFields.description: questionBoxIcon is the icon for the Question Box.

UpdateAssetSettingsResponse is the response returned with possibly some errors

types.name: UpdateAssetStatusInput
types.description:
UpdateAssetStatusInput contains the input to change the status of a comment as
it relates to being open/closed for commenting.

inputFields.name: closedAt
inputFields.description:
closedAt is the time that the asset will be closed for commenting. If this
is null or in the future, it will be open for commenting.

inputFields.name: closedMessage
inputFields.description:
closedMessage is the message to be set on the asset when it is closed. If it
is null, then the message will default to the globally set `closedMessage`.

types.name: UpdateAssetStatusResponse
types.description:
UpdateAssetStatusResponse is the response returned with possibly some errors
relating to the update status attempt.

fields.name: errors
fields.description: An array of errors relating to the mutation that occurred.

types.description:
CloseAssetResponse is the response returned with possibly some errors
relating to the update status attempt.

fields.name: errors

types.name: UpdateSettingsInput
types.description:
UpdateSettingsInput is the input used to input the global site settings. This
will override the existing settings, so all fields must be included.

inputFields.name: moderation
inputFields.description: moderation is the moderation mode for all Asset's on the site.

inputFields.name: requireEmailConfirmation
inputFields.description: Enables a requirement for email confirmation before a user can login.

inputFields.name: infoBoxEnable
inputFields.description:
infoBoxEnable will enable the Info Box content visible above the question
box.

inputFields.name: infoBoxContent
inputFields.description: infoBoxContent is the content of the Info Box.

inputFields.name: questionBoxEnable
inputFields.description:
questionBoxEnable will enable the Question Box's content to be visible above
The comment box.

inputFields.name: questionBoxContent
inputFields.description: questionBoxContent is the content of the Question Box.

inputFields.name: premodLinksEnable
inputFields.description: premodLinksEnable will put all comments that contain links into premod.

inputFields.name: questionBoxIcon
inputFields.description: questionBoxIcon is the icon for the Question Box.

inputFields.name: autoCloseStream
inputFields.description:
autoCloseStream when true will auto close the stream when the `closeTimeout`
amount of seconds have been reached.

inputFields.name: customCssUrl
inputFields.description: customCssUrl is the URL of the custom CSS used to display on the frontend.

inputFields.name: closedTimeout
inputFields.description:
closedTimeout is the amount of seconds from the created_at timestamp that a
given asset will be considered closed.

inputFields.name: closedMessage
inputFields.description:
closedMessage is the message shown to the user when the given Asset is
closed.

inputFields.name: disableCommenting
inputFields.description: disableCommenting will disable commenting site-wide.

inputFields.name: disableCommentingMessage
inputFields.description:
disableCommentingMessage will be shown above the comment stream while
commenting is disabled site-wide.

inputFields.name: charCountEnable
inputFields.description: charCountEnable is true when the character count restriction is enabled.

inputFields.name: charCount
inputFields.description: charCount is the maximum number of characters a comment may be.

inputFields.name: organizationName
inputFields.description: organizationName is the name of the organization.

inputFields.name: organizationContactEmail
inputFields.description: organizationContactEmail is the email of the organization.

inputFields.name: editCommentWindowLength
inputFields.description:
editCommentWindowLength is the length of time (in milliseconds) after a
comment is posted that it can still be edited by the author.

inputFields.name: wordlist
inputFields.description: wordlist allows changing the available wordlists.

inputFields.name: domains
inputFields.description: domains allows changing the available lists of domains.

types.name: UpdateWordlistInput
types.description: UpdateWordlistInput is the list of words that composes the Wordlist.

inputFields.name: banned
inputFields.description: banned words will by default reject the comment if it is found.

inputFields.name: suspect
inputFields.description: suspect words will simply flag the comment.

types.name: UpdateDomainsInput
types.description: UpdateDomainsInput describes all the available lists of domains.

inputFields.name: whitelist
inputFields.description: whitelist is the list of domains that the embed is allowed to render on.

every half hour.

fields.name: commentAdded
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a comment was added.
`asset_id` is required except for users with the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.
Non privileged user can only subscribe to 'NONE' and/or 'ACCEPTED' statuses.

fields.name: commentEdited
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a comment was edited.
`asset_id` is required except for users with the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: commentFlagged
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a comment was flagged.
Requires the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: commentAccepted
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a comment has been accepted.
Requires the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: commentRejected
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a comment has been rejected.
Requires the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: commentReset
fields.description:
Get an update whenever the status of a comment has been reset.
Requires the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: userSuspended
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a user has been suspended.
`user_id` must match id of current user except for
users with the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: userBanned
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a user has been banned.
`user_id` must match id of current user except for
users with the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: usernameFlagged
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a username was flagged.
`user_id` must match id of current user except for
users with the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: usernameRejected
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a username has been rejected.
`user_id` must match id of current user except for
users with the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: usernameApproved
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a username has been approved. `user_id` must match id
of current user except for users with the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: usernameChanged
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a username has been changed. `user_id` must match id
of current user except for users with the `ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` role.

fields.name: userCreated
fields.description:
Get an update whenever a user is created. Only accessible to users with the
`ADMIN` or `MODERATOR` roles.

fields.name: commentFeatured
fields.description: Subscribe to featured comments.

fields.name: commentUnfeatured
fields.description: Subscribe to featured comments.

fields.name: respectActionCreated
fields.description: Subscribe to respects.

fields.name: respectActionDeleted
fields.description: Subscribe to respect removals.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name and description, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

types.name: DefaultUserProfile
types.description:
DefaultUserProfile is a fallback if the type of UserProfile can't be
determined (like if it was from a plugin that was removed).

fields.name: id
fields.description: The id is an identifier for the user profile (email, facebook id, etc)

fields.name: provider
fields.description: name of the provider attached to the authentication mode

types.name: LocalUserProfile
types.description:
LocalUserProfile is for a User who has an authentication profile linked to
their email address.

fields.name: id
fields.description: id is the User's email address.

fields.name: provider
fields.description:
name of the provider attached to the authentication mode, in this case,
'local'.

fields.name: confirmedAt
fields.description:
confirmedAt is the Date that the user had their email address confirmed,
which is null if it has not been verified.

types.name: DefaultAction
types.description: DefaultAction is the Action provided for undefined types.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID of the action.

fields.name: user
fields.description: The author of the action.

fields.name: updated_at
fields.description: The time when the Action was updated.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: The time when the Action was created.

types.name: DefaultActionSummary
types.description: DefaultActionSummary is the ActionSummary provided for undefined types.

fields.name: count
fields.description: The count of actions with this group.

fields.name: current_user
fields.description: The current user's action.

types.name: DefaultAssetActionSummary
types.description: DefaultAssetActionSummary is the AssetActionSummary provided for undefined types.

fields.name: actionCount
fields.description: Number of actions associated with actionable types on this this Asset.

fields.name: actionableItemCount
fields.description: Number of unique actionable types that are referenced by the actions.

types.name: FlagAssetActionSummary
types.description: A summary of counts related to all the Flags on an Asset.

fields.name: actionCount
fields.description: Number of flags associated with actionable types on this this Asset.

fields.name: actionableItemCount
fields.description: Number of unique actionable types that are referenced by the flags.

types.name: FlagActionSummary
types.description: Summary for Flag Action with a a unique reason.

fields.name: count
fields.description: The total count of flags with this reason.

fields.name: reason
fields.description: The reason for which the Flag Action was created.

fields.name: current_user
fields.description: The flag by the current user against the parent entity with this reason.

types.name: DontAgreeActionSummary
types.description: Summary for Don't Agree Action with a a unique reason.

fields.name: count
fields.description: The total count of flags with this reason.

fields.name: current_user
fields.description: The don't agree action by the current user against the parent entity with this reason.

types.name: GenericUserError
types.description: A generic error not related to validation reasons.

fields.name: translation_key
fields.description:
Translation key relating to a translatable string containing details to be
displayed to the end user.

types.name: ValidationUserError
types.description: A validation error that affects the input.

fields.name: translation_key
fields.description:
Translation key relating to a translatable string containing details to be
displayed to the end user.

fields.name: field_name
fields.description: The field in question that caused the error.

enumValues.name: RESPECT
enumValues.description: Represents a RespectAction.

fields.name: count
fields.description: The count of actions with this group.

fields.name: current_user
fields.description: The current user's action.

types.name: RespectAssetActionSummary
types.description: A summary of counts related to all the Respects on an Asset.

fields.name: actionCount
fields.description: Number of respects associated with actionable types on this this Asset.

fields.name: actionableItemCount
fields.description: Number of unique actionable types that are referenced by the respects.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted in [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/).
